mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_course_group_activity (c_id, c_title, c_sub_title, c_desc, c_intro, c_image_url, c_single_price, c_group_price, c_pt_num, c_pt_period, c_start_time, c_end_time, c_create_time, c_state) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{subTitle}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, #{singlePrice}, #{groupPrice}, #{ptNum}, #{ptPeriod}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{createTime}, #{state}, )
